channel.title: CVE Feed for UnitedOver -- Digits: WordPress Mobile Number Signup and Login
channel.description: The latest CVEs for UnitedOver -- Digits: WordPress Mobile Number Signup and Login

item.title: CVE-2024-0203|2024-03-07T19:32:59.943Z -- UnitedOver -- Digits: WordPress Mobile Number Signup and Login
item.description: The Digits plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 8.4.1. This is due to missing nonce validation in the 'digits_save_settings' function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to modify the default role of registered users to elevate user privileges via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
